title: Khusro Bakhtiar, Noor-ul-Haq Qadri, Attaullah Esakhelvi call on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 6 (APP):Minister for National Food Security Makhdoom Khurso Bakhtiar and Minister for Religious Affairs Noor-ul-Haq Qadri separately called on Prime Minister Imran Khan on Friday.
Renowned singer Attaullah Khan Esakhelvi also called on the Prime Minister here at the PM
Office.
